titleStmt.title: His Maiesties declaration and finall resolution concerning the petition of the honourable the city of London to the Lords of his privie councell wherein is set downe His Majesties determination by way of an absolute answer to the said petition.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
